mapper.select: select id, project_id, create_time, update_time, is_deleted, method_hash, annotation_name, attribute_name, attribute_type, attribute_value, full_method, simple_class_name, spring_mapping_annotation from lv_invoke_method_annotation where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into lv_invoke_method_annotation(project_id, create_time, update_time, is_deleted, method_hash, annotation_name, attribute_name, attribute_type, attribute_value, full_method, simple_class_name, spring_mapping_annotation) values (#{projectId}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{isDeleted}, #{methodHash}, #{annotationName}, #{attributeName}, #{attributeType}, #{attributeValue}, #{fullMethod}, #{simpleClassName}, #{springMappingAnnotation})

insert into lv_invoke_method_annotation(project_id, create_time, update_time, is_deleted, method_hash, annotation_name, attribute_name, attribute_type, attribute_value, full_method, simple_class_name, spring_mapping_annotation) values
(#{entity.projectId}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.isDeleted}, #{entity.methodHash}, #{entity.annotationName}, #{entity.attributeName}, #{entity.attributeType}, #{entity.attributeValue}, #{entity.fullMethod}, #{entity.simpleClassName}, #{entity.springMappingAnnotation})

insert into lv_invoke_method_annotation(project_id, create_time, update_time, is_deleted, method_hash, annotation_name, attribute_name, attribute_type, attribute_value, full_method, simple_class_name, spring_mapping_annotation) values
(#{entity.projectId}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.isDeleted}, #{entity.methodHash}, #{entity.annotationName}, #{entity.attributeName}, #{entity.attributeType}, #{entity.attributeValue}, #{entity.fullMethod}, #{entity.simpleClassName}, #{entity.springMappingAnnotation})
on duplicate key update project_id = values(project_id), create_time = values(create_time), update_time = values(update_time), is_deleted = values(is_deleted), method_hash = values(method_hash), annotation_name = values(annotation_name), attribute_name = values(attribute_name), attribute_type = values(attribute_type), attribute_value = values(attribute_value), full_method = values(full_method), simple_class_name = values(simple_class_name), spring_mapping_annotation = values(spring_mapping_annotation)
mapper.update:
update lv_invoke_method_annotation
project_id = #{projectId},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted},
method_hash = #{methodHash},
annotation_name = #{annotationName},
attribute_name = #{attributeName},
attribute_type = #{attributeType},
attribute_value = #{attributeValue},
full_method = #{fullMethod},
simple_class_name = #{simpleClassName},
spring_mapping_annotation = #{springMappingAnnotation},
where id = #{id}
